plot: A look at the Hutterites, an Anabaptist religious community similar to the Amish or the Mennonites in rural Alberta.
title: The Hutterites
plot_es: A look at the Hutterites, an Anabaptist religious community similar to the Amish or the Mennonites in rural Alberta.
plot_en: A look at the Hutterites, an Anabaptist religious community similar to the Amish or the Mennonites in rural Alberta.
